title: Add the Number of Options
text: We can add the number of red ace options to the number of club options to find the total number of options.

title: Number of Red Aces
text: There are 2 red aces in a deck of cards: an ace of diamonds and an ace of hearts.

title: Number of Clubs
text: There are 13 clubs in a deck of cards, from the ace of clubs to the king of clubs.

title: Add the Number of Options
text: # of red ace options+# of club options $$2+13=15$$

title: Total Ways
text: There are 15 ways to pick a red ace or a club from a standard card playing deck.
